ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of KARIM H. KARIM of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, on a part-time basis.
